Event.name: Scrutinizing_for
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> examines a <fen>Ground</fen> closely, alert to the presence of a <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Cognizer
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> pays attention to an entity in order to discover something about it.
<ex><fex name="Cognizer">Leslie</fex> <t>examined</t> the glass for cracks.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> pays attention to the <fen>Ground</fen>, so named because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex>Leslie <t>examined</t> <fex name="Ground">the glass</fex> for cracks.</ex> <ex>Kim <t>searched</t> <fex name="Ground">the woods</fex> for mushrooms.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Phenomenon
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is alert for in the <fen>Ground</fen>.
<ex>Leslie <t>examined</t> the glass <fex name="Phenomenon">for cracks</fex>.</ex> <ex>Kim <t>searched</t> the woods <fex name="Phenomenon">for mushrooms</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> scrutinizes the <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> which allows them to scrutinize the <fen>Ground</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> scrutinizes the <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The event that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> hopes to bring about by looking for the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex>You should <t>inspect</t> your mail <fex name="Purp">to determine the outcome of the module transfer</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An entity directed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> that interacts with the <fen>Ground</fen> to accomplish the scrutiny.
<ex>The temperature controller <t>monitored</t> the temperature <fex name="ins">with a calibrated silicon diode</fex>.</ex></def-root>
